The 2nd Pacquiao–Elorde Awards is an annual awarding ceremony recognizing the top boxers and athletes from Boxing and other sports for the year 2024. The awards were jointly organized by the family of Philippine boxing legend Gabriel "Flash" Elorde and former 8-division world champion and Senator Manny Pacquiao.
The awarding ceremony was held on March 20, 2025 at the Okada Manila, Parañaque City. The program will consist of an 8-fight boxing card before the awarding rites, in which over 70 boxers, boxing personalties and sports athletes will be giving honors.
